name: nuxt-bootstrap-icons
description: An easier way of using bootstrap-icons in your Nuxt project!

scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare docs
scripts.release:major: changelogen --release --major --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: changelogen --release --minor --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: changelogen --release --patch --output docs/content/release-notes.md && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
